name: Access H7 - GWJ
description:
Warning: this is supposed to be a difficult game! (Ended up easier than I planned, though.)

This Godot Wild Jam game is a sequel to another Godot Wild Jam (Warthunder H). But you don't have to play the first at all (the story is summarized in the intro).

Unlike the first one, Access H7 is a "hacker" puzzle game. Take your time, and break into the system of a robotic lab facility. You can't go there physically, so you have to use their robots to make your way. And all seen from their surveillance cameras!

Names mentioned are fellows from the GWJ discord server.
